items.title: ‘We almost lost $10,000’: My late father-in-law’s company claimed his life-insurance policy didn’t exist. It did.
items.description: “The company changed names several times, and it was very difficult tracking them down for payment of benefits.”

items.title: ‘My retirement is completely in bitcoin’: Why don’t more people do what I do?
items.description: “‘I also borrow against bitcoin. What’s the catch?”

items.title: ‘There’s a lot of tension’: My brother and I manage a $5 million trust. How do we solve our many disagreements?
items.description: “We have a good estate attorney, but he just repeats the facts; we need someone to help with the feelings.”

items.title: ‘I’ve always lived hand-to-mouth’: I’m 64. My father left me $400K from his 457(b) plan. My brother is suing me. How can I defend myself?
items.description: “I live off my Social Security of $900 a month.”

items.title: Americans’ happiness is at a record low. Are we just using our money the wrong way?
items.description: Fewer than half of Americans say they are financially secure, but there are indications that it’s not just a lack of money that’s stripping away Ameri...
